### Beaver Temp Plot

```{r}
beaverGraph <- reactive({
  beaver = beaver %>% filter(day == 307) %>%
    select(time, temp)
  })
renderPlot({
  ggplot(beaverGraph()) + 
    geom_point(aes(x = time, y = temp))
})
